FKE UTM ALUMNI MEMBER PROFILE UPDATE

[Update Here](https://fke.utm.my/alumnimember/)

This form is used by FKE to trace recent status of FKE alumni. All the collected information is important for the faculty to keep in touch with their alumni.

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/WhatsApp-Image-2023-06-12-at-2.42.58-PM-4.jpeg)

**GIVING BACK**

*   Share your knowledge or experience to FKE student/staff
*   Sponsor and contribute in kind through program
*   Contribution to FKE facilities
*   Support our Endowment Fund ([https://endowmen.utm.my](https://endowmen.utm.my/)
    )

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/WhatsApp-Image-2023-06-12-at-2.42.58-PM.jpeg)

**NEWS**

*   FKE [news](https://news.utm.my/ms/department/faculty-of-electrical-engineering/) 
*   FKE [facebook](https://www.facebook.com/ee.utm.my) 
*   FKE [instagram](https://www.instagram.com/fke_utm/)
    
*   FKE Alumni [e-Newsletter](https://fke.utm.my/alumni/fke_alumni_enewsletter/)
     (New!)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/11.jpg)

### **CONTACT US:**

Your contribution means to us for supporting the university in its journey to realize its vision and mission. In all cases, we shall be pleased to discuss the possibilities and option with you.

**Faculty of Electrical Engineering**  
**Universiti Teknologi Malaysia**  
**81310 Johor Bahru, Johor**  
alumnifke@fke.utm.my
